title: El héroe de libros (The Book Hero)
itunes:title: El héroe de libros (The Book Hero)
description:
In 2013, a Peruvian photographer visits his parents’ village and unexpectedly becomes dedicated to improving literacy in rural Peru.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3GiQb8x.
